dt: {bc}a tropical American tree ({it}Crescentia cujete{/it}) of the bignonia family
{bc}one whose hard shell is used for a utensil
{bc}a utensil (such as a bottle or dipper) made from the shell of a calabash

et: French & Spanish; French {it}calebasse{/it} gourd, from Spanish {it}calabaza{/it}
shortdef: a tropical American tree (Crescentia cujete) of the bignonia family; also : its large hard-shelled globose fruit
gourd; especially : one whose hard shell is used for a utensil
a utensil (such as a bottle or dipper) made from the shell of a calabash
